publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-6151 Sandra White: Euroquiz 2010â€”That the Parliament congratulates all at Scotstoun Primary School, a great school that aims to foster respect, good citizenship skills and attitudes in the school working in partnership with parents, pupils and the wider community, on reaching the final of Euroquiz 2010; commends the work of the Scottish European Education Trust for running the programme, which helps young people develop their knowledge of Europe and the European Union, and wishes Scotstoun Primary School and all other finalists the best of luck in the national final, which will be webcast live from the Parliament for the participating schools to watch on Monday 10 May. Supported by: Aileen Campbell*, Gil Paterson*, Alasdair Allan*
S3M-6151 Euroquiz 2010 (lodged on 14 April 2010) Bill Kidd*, Liam McArthur*, Bob Doris*, Brian Adam*, Jamie Hepburn*
